parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> DLC

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns list of DLCs that are used in the mission. List is created only from units listed in mission.sqm and does not detect units created by scripts!

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getMissionDLCs]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - list of DLCs detected for the mission. Example: <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["Orange","Enoch","Expansion","Heli","Contact","Mark","Argo","Jets"]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_usedDLCs = [[getMissionDLCs]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]] [[getObjectDLC]] [[getPersonUsedDLCs]] [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]] [[getDLCAssetsUsage]] [[getAssetDLCInfo]]
</value></part></template></root>
